code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import data from"./resturants.json";var yearInMilliseconds=31536000000;export var chefSlice=createSlice({name:"chef",initialState:{chefsData:data.chef,value:data.chef,chefName:"",singleChef:{}},reducers:{allChefs:function allChefs(state){state.value=state.chefsData;},popularChefs:function popularChefs(state){state.value=state.chefsData.sort(function(a,b){return a.visited-b.visited;});},newChefs:function newChefs(state){var currentDate=new Date().getTime();state.value=state.chefsData.filter(function(e){return new Date(e.startDate).getTime()>currentDate-yearInMilliseconds*5;});},getChefName:function getChefName(state,action){var temp=state.chefsData.find(function(e){return e._id===action.payload;});state.chefName=(temp===null||temp===void 0?void 0:temp.firstName)+" "+(temp===null||temp===void 0?void 0:temp.lastName);},getChefOfTheWeek:function getChefOfTheWeek(state){var chefOfTheWeek=state.chefsData.find(function(e){return e._id===data.chefOfTheWeek;});if(chefOfTheWeek){state.singleChef=chefOfTheWeek;}}}});var _chefSlice$actions=chefSlice.actions,allChefs=_chefSlice$actions.allChefs,popularChefs=_chefSlice$actions.popularChefs,newChefs=_chefSlice$actions.newChefs,getChefName=_chefSlice$actions.getChefName,getChefOfTheWeek=_chefSlice$actions.getChefOfTheWeek;export{allChefs,popularChefs,newChefs,getChefName,getChefOfTheWeek};export default chefSlice.reducer;
